Method Detail







data1













test_ge_le_gt_lt


Test the functions IRingElement.le(IRingElement)
 IRingElement.ge(IRingElement) executed only if
 IRingElementFactory.randomValue(IRingElement, IRingElement) is
 not depreciated.






Throws:

java.lang.SecurityException - If the reflective examination of the factory fails

java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - If the reflective examination of the factory fails









testRandomMinMax


This test is only applied if
 IRingElementFactory.randomValue(IRingElement, IRingElement) is
 not annotated as depreciated.






Throws:

java.lang.SecurityException - If the reflective examination of the factory fails

java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - If the reflective examination of the factory fails









getFactory


public IRingElementFactory<RE> getFactory()




Description copied from interface: TestBaseInterface


This method provides access to the factory of the base type. This is used
 to make tests generic for all types.






Returns:
the factory of a IRingElement upon which the factory's
         methods are to be tested.










isRandomValueMinMaxDepreceated


boolean isRandomValueMinMaxDepreceated()




examine the factory and decide whether its method randomValue(min,max) is depreceated.






Throws:

java.lang.SecurityException - If the reflective examination of the factory fails

java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - If the reflective examination of the factory fails
